name: Chaaman Roganjosh
description: Cottage cheese cooked in aromatic curry prepared with dry spices & Kashmiri chillies

name: Dumaloo
description: Deep fried potatoes dum cooked in gravy flavoured with dry ginger powder, fennel powder and other spices.

name: Mutton Roganjosh
description: Tender mutton cooked in a rich and aromatic gravy made with dry spices, and Kashmiri red chili.

name: Mutton Yakhni
description: Tender mutton cooked in a yogurt-based gravy with aromatic spices.

name: Goshtaba
description: Minced mutton meatballs cooked in a creamy yogurt-based gravy with aromatic spices.

name: Kashmiri Non-Veg Thali
description: A lavish spread featuring a variety of Kashmiri non-vegetarian dishes, served with rice and accompaniments.
